item.title:
News just in🎈🍻⚡️
To mark 20 years of GM, we’re over the moon to reveal that for the first time ever the Mountain Stage will be open on Thursday! The purveyors of good times, @metronomy will be kicking off the jamboree with a headline set to behold!
Now roll on August! GM 💚
item.dc:creator: @GreenManFest
item.description:
News just in🎈🍻⚡️

To mark 20 years of GM, we’re over the moon to reveal that for the first time ever the Mountain Stage will be open on Thursday! The purveyors of good times, @metronomy will be kicking off the jamboree with a headline set to behold!

Now roll on August! GM 💚

item.title: R to @Heythereitslou1: Yes, next few weeks! 👀
item.dc:creator: @GreenManFest
item.description: Yes, next few weeks! 👀

item.title: R to @PN_Gower: Hey there, if you shoot an email to customerservices@ticketline.co.uk with details they should be able to update this for you! Cheers, GM 😃
item.dc:creator: @GreenManFest
item.description: Hey there, if you shoot an email to customerservices@ticketline.co.uk with details they should be able to update this for you! Cheers, GM 😃

item.dc:creator: @GreenManFest
item.description: It is indeed. You can upgrade at the Box Office or arrange beforehand by sending details to info@greenman.net 😃

item.title: The summer solstice is upon us. The Beacons are beckoning. It's not much longer now...⏰ #GreenMan22
